import React from 'react' import { Icon } from '@iconify/react'; import { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; function Details({h, currentFormattedData}) { const [brdata, setWeatherData] = useState(null); useEffect(() => { const fetchdt = async () => { try { const { lat, lon } = currentFormattedData.lat; const currentDate = new Date().toISOString(); const brightSkyResponse = await fetch(`https://api.brightsky.dev/weather?lat=${lat}&lon=${lon}&date=${currentDate}`); const brightSkyData = await brightSkyResponse.json(); console.log('Bright Sky API Response:', brightSkyData.weather); setWeatherData(brightSkyData.weather); } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching weather data:', error.message); } }; fetchdt(); }, [currentFormattedData]); if (!brdata) { return null; } return (
